author: deni64k
content:
Hi there! A few questions:
* Can you share links to those SSVs running on Pyrmont?
* How do SSVs look in Beacon Chain's perspective? Is it all one validator abstracted by one index?
* If a slashing committed by SSV (if preventative measures fail), does it mean the whole group of the SSV gets slashed?

author: deni64k
content:
This call `GetDuties` has to be optimized. Calling `GetDuties` on every "partial" attestation is very slow and won't work in case of many validators.
https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/compare/develop...alonmuroch:ssv#diff-5674756280c70dbd14773c3f1bfa41f30db23afe568d8f3c1cbc761e04c49ea1R88

author: deni64k
content: I see `ssvnode` works only with a single validator. Are there any plans to scale it on, say, 100 validators per process?

content: on what branch are you on? seems really old

content: yeah for sure, a single SSV should be able to manage lots of validators
